#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int fact(int a)
{
	if(a==0)
	return 1;
	
	int i,f=1;
	for(i=a;i>0;i--)
	{
		f=f*i;
	}
	return f;
}
int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int a[11];
		int i;
		for(i=0;i<11;i++)
		cin>>a[i];
		sort(a,a+11);
		reverse(a,a+11);
		int count=0,countb=0;
		int k;
		cin>>k;
		int p=k-1;
		if(a[p]!=a[p+1])
		cout<<"1\n";
		else
		{
			for(i=0;i<11;i++)
			{
				if(a[i]==a[p])
				count++;
			}
			for(i=0;i<=p;i++)
			{
			//	cout<<a[i]<<" ";
				if(a[i]==a[p])
				countb++;
			}
		//	cout<<count<<" "<<countb<<"  ";
			int ans=fact(count)/(fact(countb)*fact(count-countb));
			cout<<ans<<"\n";
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
